txt.en: 'I have been studying the little sapling all day. Look upon it, friend. Does it seem... sad?\n\n'I wonder... would you make your way to Emerald Twospade in Hoarhallow and ask her how she rouses plants that seem in such a state?'
'When I tend to my plants, I sing. It seems to me that they sway along with my voice. I would think that such an act would do the same for your problem, friend.'
Emerald told you the secret is to sing to the plant. Return to Gl√¢n Vraig and sing to your sapling.
Faranil believes that your sapling is looking as though something made it sad. She wants you to seek out some advice on how you might brighten the mood of your little sapling.
Emerald Twospade advises that you should sing to your sapling
'Please, ask Emerald for her advice. She can be found in Hoarhallow.'
As you sing, the sapling seems to glow with joy
Emerald Twospade advised you to sing to your sapling
Make your way to Hoarhallow, talk to Emerald Twospade and ask her how she heartens the plants that she tends.
Speak with Emerald Twospade in Hoarhallow
